column1: '''Gondor! Gondor, between the Mountains and the Sea!''' is a poem spoken by [[Aragorn]] to [[Legolas]] and [[Gimli]] during their pursuit of the [[Uruk-hai]] in "[[The Riders of Rohan]]" upon seeing the [[White Mountains]] to the south.
West Wind blew there; the light upon the [[White Tree of Gondor|Silver Tree]]
Fell like bright rain in gardens of the [[Kings of Gondor|Kings]] of old.
O proud walls! White towers! O [[Crown of Gondor|wingéd crown]] and throne of gold!

column2: Gondor! Shall Men behold the Silver Tree

column1: Or West Wind blow again between the Mountains and the Sea?
